label: Today the Marc Tager Sports Centre was dedicated in Upper Nazareth in memory of Marc Tager, Tager was one of the victims of the plane disaster over Scotland in December 1988, when the Pan Am Jumbo was blown up over the town of Lockerbie, killing all the passengers on board.
